meanings.definition: A person who uses a microscope to study small objects.
meanings.sent1: The young microscopists observed tiny insects under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The team of microscopists discovered a new species of bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The microscopists were so focused on their work that they almost missed lunchtime.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, microscopists are like detectives uncovering hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The microscopists' keen eyes revealed the intricate details of the cell structure.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the use of microscopes for scientific research.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated microscopists spent hours analyzing samples in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Many universities have renowned microscopists leading groundbreaking research.
meanings.sent3: The microscopists' excitement was palpable as they made a breakthrough discovery.
meanings.sent4: To the microscopists, each slide held a world waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The microscopists' expertise was crucial in identifying the unknown substance.
